BBWPC 0.10.3
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

bbwp()

Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level

bbwp_check_gt()

Helper function to check and update the groundwater class

bbwp_check_lsw()

Helper function to check the LSW table

bbwp_check_meas()

Helper function to check, update and extend the table with measurements

bbwp_farm_score()

Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all fields in the Netherlands

bbwp_field_indicators()

Calculate five risk or opportunity indicators for an agricultural field

bbwp_field_properties()

Calculate the relative impact of field properties given its position in the landscape

bbwp_field_scores()

Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all fields in the Netherlands

bbwp_format_aer()

Convert possible B_AER_CBS values to standardized values

bbwp_meas_rank()

Rank the suitability of agronomic measures to improve soil and water management for a given field

bbwp_meas_score()

Evaluate the contribution of agronomic measures to improve soil mand water management

bbwp_measures

Agronomic measures that can be applied

bbwp_parms

A table with the BBWP parameters

cdf_rank()

Calculate the chance that soil property is lower than the measured value given the variation in a catchment

ecoregeling()

Calculate the Ecoregeling scores on field and farm level

er_aer_reward

An overview of correction factors per economic agricultural area

er_croprotation()

Calculate the crop rotation based total score for five opportunity indicators

er_crops

An overview of crop lists used in Ecoregelingen

er_farm_aim()

Calculate the minimum required Ecoregelingen Scores on Farm level

er_farm_measure

The impact score of farm based measures

er_farm_score()

Calculate the total EcoRegelingen score of five opportunity indicators

er_field_scores()

Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators conform Ecoregelingen Scoring

er_meas_rank()

Rank the suitability of agronomic measures to improve soil, climate, biodiversity and water management for a given field

er_meas_score()

Evaluate the contribution of agronomic measures to improve soil mand water management

er_measures

The applicability of Ecoregeling Measures per crop type

er_medal()

Calculate the Medal on Field and Farm level

er_opi()

Calculate the Opportunity Index for the Ecoregeling method

er_scoring

The importance and scoring of environmental challenges for Ecoregelingen

lsw

A national dataset describing statistics of soil properties per Local Surface Water

wf()

Helper function to weight and correct the risk and scores
